overview:
Mike Degeneffe joined Ceridian in April 2008 as Chief Technology Officer. In this role, Mike is responsible for providing technology vision and leadership. He works with the business leaders to define strategies that leverage technology to simplify Ceridian’s organization, deliver repeatable and reliable services, and drive innovation in the delivery of market leading products and services.

Mike has over 20 years of experience managing all aspects of technology, from systems development to infrastructure management. He has experience in the U.S., Canada, Mexico and Europe.

Prior to joining Ceridian, Mike was Chief Information Officer at Deluxe Corporation in Minneapolis. Prior to that he spent six years at Residential Funding Corporation (RFC), a business unit of GMAC, where he held the position of Managing Director, Chief Information Officer. Before joining GMAC, Mike held positions of increasing responsibility at SmithKlein Beecham, GE, and National Car Rental.

relationships.title: Senior Vice President Chief Technology Officer
